entry.summary: Celtic loanee Liam Shaw got off the mark for Morecambe on Saturday, scoring his first goal since his summer arrival in a 1-1 draw against Portsmouth. The 21-year-old joined the English League One side on transfer deadline day as he went on the hunt for regular game time down south. Shaw has previous experience playing ... entry.title: "I’ll never regret it"; Former international defender reflects on 'incredible' Celtic experience
entry.summary: Former Celtic defender Efe Ambrose has reflected upon his career, including the disappointment that came from the Champions League match against Juventus in 2013.
